body: They had me going there with Pache and her shady experiments. Then they summoned a nude Satori, so far so good. Then they start talking until the hedeath of the universe. Then Satori becomes a maid, good.  Then Koakuma starts coarsely mistreating her. Then it ends like a Sonic Forces level. Seriously, though, was this porn?
I want to know what the radiation text says
